title: [Melorra's Armory]
description: A tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the stark stone block walls, and a domed white stucco ceiling rises overhead.  A fishscale blue mermaid figurine sits in one corner of a white limestone floor.  There is a white marble shelf on one side of the shop and some hammered copper display hooks on the other.
